title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Plan to make land available for people in 29 'heavily populated areas'
description: To fight against the spread of the coronavirus, the Department of Human Settlements will be relying on a heat map to identify hot spots it should pay attention to.
content:
Department of Human Settlements Minister, Lindiwe Sisulu, says her department has identified 29 areas which are "heavily populated" and could be breeding grounds for the spread of Covid-19. 
To fight against the spread of the coronavirus, the department will… [+2040 chars]
